thread.title: Konami Won't Make Any New Triple-A Console Games Besides PES - Report
thread.title_full: Konami Won't Make Any New Triple-A Console Games Besides PES - Report - newsR

author: newsr.in
title: Konami Won't Make Any New Triple-A Console Games Besides PES - Report
text: A brand new and quite massive report has appeared online concerning the future of Konami, the publisher behind huge franchises like Metal Gear Solid. Apparently, the Japanese company no longer wants to make triple-A console games, with the only exception being its yearly Pro Evolution Soccer (PES) series. Konami hasn't been going through the best of periods this year, as rumors of internal turmoil as well as shady practice in regards to the launch of Metal Gear Solid V: The... Â»
